channel.title: Hacking Game (Virtual Hack World)
channel.description:
There is a new browser game called Nabu, it is located at [url=http://www.nabu.be]http://www.nabu.be[/url]
It is a fun game, I would everyone suggest to try it, it has a very addictive gameplay and an original way interface.
From the author: [i] The game is currently in a testfase, it has been released to the public a few days ago, the bugs are out of the game and now it tries to attract a greater audience. The point of the game is to earn virtual money wich you can use to buy new hardware. To earn your money you have to hack bank accounts, send spam mails, sell warez, ...
There are different ideas for expansions when the game hits 1000 users, currently there are around 500. [/i]
The more, the better! Post here if you join the game, that way we can help eachoter.
There is also an irc channel at quakenet (irc.quakenet.org), #nabu , hope to see you there!

item.title: Hacking Game (Virtual Hack World)
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

i remember playing a “hacking” game that had to have been directed at script kiddies bc it was really easy it was like: look at server, get ip, bruteforce, steal their money, repeat as desired and gain levels…oh and you could be traced but the trace time i found to always be plenty of time lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Game (Virtual Hack World)
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

LOL im guessing this game is hacking as it would be if it were a skill in r00nscape

“You just advanced a level in hacking, You are now level 10. You may now use AutoHack3.0 bank cracker”

Im even going to check it out in a sec so i can make more fun of it.

Edit: actually no i wont, i just read some of the faq. It explains even the most basic things about computers and looks as though it is aimed at skript kiddies…
